edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Class ActiveBoxContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.ActiveBoxContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domable, Cloneable

    public class ActiveBoxContent
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Domable
    This class defines a content that can be displayed by ActiveBox objects. This content can be a text, an image, a fragment of an image or a combination of text and images. The style (colours, font and size, etc.) can be specified in a BoxBase object. It stores also information about the optimal size and location of the ActiveBox.
    Version:
    13.09.09
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
